alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 7:17PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of central Ravalli County through 815 PM MST... At 715 PM MST, the public reported intense snow showers along a line extending from near Stevensville to 10 miles southwest of Darby. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. Snowfall rates up to one inch per hour are possible. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Darby, Victor, Conner, Woodside, Pinesdale, Sula, Grantsdale, Bell Crossing, Charlos Heights, Corvallis and Como. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 12 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys
